article.description: Patrick McCaw scored 25 points, including a 3-pointer at the buzzer to force overtime, and UNLV beat Nevada 102-91 on Saturday night.
article.headline: McCaw hits 3 to force overtime; UNLV beats Nevada 102-91
article.linkText: McCaw hits 3 to force overtime; UNLV beats Nevada 102-91
article.story: LAS VEGAS -- Patrick McCaw scored 25 points, including a 3-pointer at the buzzer to force overtime, and UNLV beat Nevada 102-91 on Saturday night. Jordan Cornish had seven of his 17 points in overtime as the Rebels outscored the Wolf Pack 22-11 in the extra period. Jerome Seagears made five 3-pointers and finished with 21 points for UNLV (16-12, 7-8 Mountain West), which bounced back from a 79-74 loss at Air Force on Feb. 16 that broke a two-game winning streak. Marqueze Coleman scored 31 points to lead Nevada (16-10, 8-6), which had its three-game win streak snapped. Coleman made a 3-pointer to give Nevada an 80-77 lead with three seconds left in regulation. McCaw then took the inbounds pass and hit a running 3 from the top of the arc to tie it at 80.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).
